title: Super League summaries
text: May 4, 2018 / 8:44 PM / Updated 12 hours ago UPDATE 5-Super League summaries Reuters Staff 2 Min Read May 4 (OPTA) - summaries from the Super League matches on Friday Huddersfield (10) 28 Tries: Wardle (12,43), Wood (33), Ta'ai (61), Mellor (72) Goals: Wood (34,44,62,73) Yellow cards: Wardle (67) Widnes (6) 18 Tries: Craven (27), Ince (52), Gilmore (69) Goals: Gilmore (28,54,69) Referee: Liam Moore Ground: Kirklees Stadium Leeds (4) 22 Tries: Golding (31), Moon (45), Hall (54), Ablett (58) Goals: Watkins (46,56,59) Warrington (11) 33 Tries: Brown (6), Livett (16,68,70), Atkins (61), Murdoch-Masila (78) Goals: Goodwin (7), Ratchford (62,69,79) Drop Goals: Roberts (39) Referee: Ben Thaler Ground: Emerald Headingley Stadium Wigan (18) 30 Tries: Gildart (21), Clubb (24), Williams (29), Tomkins (56,66), Bateman (73) Goals: Tomkins (22,25,31) Salford (0) 0 Referee: Chris Kendall Ground: DW Stadium Saturday, May 5 fixtures (GMT) Hull v Castleford (15:00) Sunday, May 6 fixtures (GMT) Wakefield v Hull Kingston Rovers (13:00)
